title: Gen Z fears AI will upend careers. Can leaders change the narrative?
description: New Harvard polling shows most young workers expect AI to reduce job prospects.
content: Good morning. Are you communicating the purpose of AI with your younger employees? According to new data from Harvard, most fear AI is going to take their jobs.The Institute of Politics at Harvard Ke… [+7908 chars]
